last_episode_to_air.name: A Midsummer Night's Detective
last_episode_to_air.overview: On the last night of Summer Vacation Special, the members have a revenge match of table tennis. This time, they have to play with special rackets that suit the heat of summer. Who will be the loser to go on a fishing boat the next morning? Meanwhile, Detectives on a Summer Night Race begins with a guest, Kang Hoon, joining the members. They have to win hint tickets through missions before they receive a request. They can use their hint tickets to solve the mystery case. Stay tuned to find out more!

name: Running Man
overview:
These days, variety entertainment is gradually disappearing. It is one of Korea's representative variety entertainment shows that has been in charge of Sunday evenings for over 10 years. In this program, many stars and members play games and missions together. It is characterized by going around several places. In particular, this program focuses solely on laughter among the many fun elements of entertainment.

Open your eyes! Big fun enters!

Open your mouth!  A big smile enters!

Open your mind! Instructive lesson enters!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
Unpredictable big laugh that no one ever imagined!! 

How many landmarks do you know representing Korea? 

Korea's representative landmark that Running Man teaches with his body! 

 Korea's top celebrities gathered there! You have to solve the missions everywhere and get out of there by the next morning through the game!! 

Through constant running and tense confrontation, the hidden back of Korean landmarks will be revealed!
